Package com.mfront.front.proxies

Interface Microservicesproxy

@FeignClient(name="api-gateway", url="localhost:8765") public interface Microservicesproxy
Proxy interface for accessing microservices endpoints.

  • Method Summary

    Method
    Description

  • Method Details

    • listPatients

      @GetMapping("/MPATIENTS/PatientRecord/patients") List<PatientBean> listPatients()
      Retrieves the list of patients from the MPATIENTS microservice.
      Returns:
      List of PatientBean objects.

    • patient

      @GetMapping("/MPATIENTS/PatientRecord/patient/{firstname}/{lastname}") PatientBean patient(@PathVariable("firstname") String firstname, @PathVariable("lastname") String lastname)
      Retrieves a specific patient by their first and last name from the MPATIENTS microservice.
      Parameters:
      firstname - First name of the patient.
      lastname - Last name of the patient.
      Returns:
      PatientBean object representing the patient.

    • addPatient

      @PostMapping("/MPATIENTS/PatientRecord/create") org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> addPatient(@RequestBody PatientBean patientBean)
      Adds a new patient to the MPATIENTS microservice.
      Parameters:
      patientBean - PatientBean object representing the new patient.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity indicating the success or failure of the operation.

    • updatePatient

      @PutMapping("/MPATIENTS/PatientRecord/patient/update") org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> updatePatient(@RequestBody PatientBean patientBean)
      Updates an existing patient in the MPATIENTS microservice.
      Parameters:
      patientBean - PatientBean object representing the patient with updated information.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity indicating the success or failure of the operation.

    • getuser

      @GetMapping("/MPATIENTS/user/{username}") UserBean getuser(@PathVariable String username)
      Retrieves user information by username from the MPATIENTS microservice.
      Parameters:
      username - Username of the user.
      Returns:
      UserBean object representing the user.

    • getUsers

      @GetMapping("/MPATIENTS/user/users") List<UserBean> getUsers()
      Retrieves the list of users from the MPATIENTS microservice.
      Returns:
      List of UserBean objects.

    • saveUser

      @PostMapping("/MPATIENTS/user/save") void saveUser(@RequestBody UserBean user)
      Saves a new user to the MPATIENTS microservice.
      Parameters:
      user - UserBean object representing the new user.

    • getAllCommentOfOnePatient

      @GetMapping("/MCOMMENTPATIENT/comment/patient/comment/{patient}") List<CommentBean> getAllCommentOfOnePatient(@PathVariable String patient)
      Retrieves all comments of a specific patient from the MCOMMENTPATIENT microservice.
      Parameters:
      patient - Patient identifier.
      Returns:
      List of CommentBean objects representing comments of the patient.

    • postNewComment

      @PostMapping("/MCOMMENTPATIENT/comment/new") void postNewComment(@RequestBody CommentBean commentBean)
      Posts a new comment to the MCOMMENTPATIENT microservice.
      Parameters:
      commentBean - CommentBean object representing the new comment.

    • getRiskLevels

      @GetMapping("/DIABETESMANAGMENT/check/{firstname}/{lastname}") String getRiskLevels(@PathVariable String firstname, @PathVariable String lastname)
      Retrieves risk levels for a specific patient from the DIABETESMANAGMENT microservice.
      Parameters:
      firstname - First name of the patient.
      lastname - Last name of the patient.
      Returns:
      String representing the risk levels.
